//#################################################################################################################################


-	script	คนขายอุปกรณ์ 3rd::de3rd	120,{
	mes " ";
	mes " ";
	mes " ";
	mes "^f7f7f7________^000000กรุณาเลือกitemที่คุณต้องการ";
	mes "";
	switch(select("-> Rune Knight" , "-> Guillotine Cross" , "-> Ranger" , "-> Warlock" , "-> Mechanic" , "-> Shadow Chaser" , "-> Minstrel/Wanderer" , "-> Genetic")) {
		case 1:	sleep2 100;	callshop "R1",1;	break;
		case 2:	sleep2 100;	callshop "R2",1;	break;
		case 3:	sleep2 100;	callshop "R3",1;	break;
		case 4:	sleep2 100;	callshop "R4",1;	break;
		case 5:	sleep2 100;	callshop "R5",1;	break;
		case 6:	sleep2 100;	callshop "R6",1;	break;
		case 7:	sleep2 100;	callshop "R7",1;	break;
		case 8:	sleep2 100;	callshop "R8",1;	break;
	}
OnInit: 
waitingroom "อุปกรณ์ 3rd",0; 
end;
}
